request.title: Performance monitoring for application and UMTS(Underlay Measurement & Tracing Service) parcel Schema
request.description: Performance monitoring profile parcel schema for POST request

enabled.description: Application performance monitoring enable or disable

policyFilters.description: Application performance Monitoring policy filters, such as application group name.

umtsConfig.description: Underlay Measurement and Tracing Service (UMTS) configuration

enabled.description: UMTS event driven monitoring enable or disable

documentation.description: This is the documentation for POST request schema for application and underlay tunnel performance monitoring profile parcel
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema

examples.description: App Performance and UMTS Monitoring enabled example
examples.name: perfMonitoring

examples.description: App Performance and UMTS Monitoring disabled example(default)
examples.name: perfMonitoring
